lead_paragraph: Adam Krikorian leaned over for a moment, trying desperately to keep his emotions in check. U.S. women's water polo captain Maggie Steffens then walked up, put her hand on his back and offered a consoling smile.

headline.print_headline: Grieving Krikorian Coaches US Women to 11-4 Win Over Spain
headline.main: Grieving Krikorian Coaches US Women to 11-4 Win Over Spain
